mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Pueblo Ribera complex is made up of six duplexes. Each unit originally consisted of a bedroom on the ground level, and a sleeping porch on the upper level. Each unit enjoys a view of La Jolla's Windansea Beach. The San Diego Historical Society declared the complex a historic district in 1977 (historic site #117). - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/El_Pueblo_Ribera [work]
